name: Mime Jr.
flavorText:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

previous.name: Bonsly
previous.flavorText:
It looks as if it is always crying.
It is actually adjusting its body’s
fluid levels by eliminating excess.

next.name: Happiny
next.flavorText:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

pokemon.name: Mime Jr.
pokemon.flavorText:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.flavorText:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

pokemon.name: Mr. Rime
pokemon.flavorText:
It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane
of ice in time with its graceful movements.
